title: Get
content:
- Sent:
```
curl https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users
```
- Received:
```
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Leanne Graham",
    "username": "Bret",
    "email": "Sincere@april.biz"
  },
  {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "Ervin Howell",
    "username": "Antonette",
    "email": "Shanna@melissa.tv"
  }
]
```
- Obs.: sent with header:
```
curl https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users -H "Authorization: token"
```

title: Post
content:
- Sent:
```
curl -X POST https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users -d 'name=Example&age=30'
```
- Received:
```
{"message": "Data added successfully"}
```
- Obs.: sent with header:
```
curl -X POST \
    https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users \
    -H 'Authorization: token' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"name": "Example", "age": 30}'
```

title: Put
content:
- Sent:
```
curl -X PUT https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users -d 'name=Example&age=30'
```
- Received:
```
{"message": "Data updated successfully"}
```
- Obs.: sent with header:
```
curl -X PUT \
    https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users \
    -H 'Authorization: token' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"name": "Example", "age": 30}'
```

title: Delete
content:
- Sent:
```
curl -X DELETE https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/1
```
- Received:
```
{"message": "Data deleted successfully"}
```
- Obs.: sent with header:
```
curl -X DELETE https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/1 -H "Authorization: token"
```
